TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed KeyAgreeKeyChoice extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The KeyAgreeKeyChoice enumeration defines the type of key used in a key agreement protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeKeyChoice EphemeralKey = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The key agreement key is ephemeral, existing only for the duration of the key agreement protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeKeyChoice StaticKey = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The key agreement key is static, existing for an extended period of time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeKeyChoice Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The key agreement key type is unknown.
